title: Executive Order 11316-Placing an Additional Position in Level V of the Federal Executive Salary Schedule
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by Section 5317 of Title 5 of the United States Code, and as President of the United States, Section 2 of Executive Order No. 11248 of October 10, 1965, as amended, is further amended by adding thereto the following:
(10) Director, Demonstration Cities Administration, Department of Housing and Urban Development.
citation: Lyndon B. Johnson, Executive Order 11316-Placing an Additional Position in Level V of the Federal Executive Salary Schedule Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306169
